alert.note: Alert for Mineral and Southern Lyon Counties (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 7:41PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CHURCHILL AND CENTRAL LYON COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM PDT... At 737 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wabuska moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Yerington, Wabuska, and Yerington Municipal Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding, including US-95 Alternate between Wabuska and Yerington. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
